price: M’akoma nso sua, na me kεtrεma nso ntumi nkasa yie, enti soma Aaron (ma no ne me nkͻ),
arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدۡرِي وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِي فَأَرۡسِلۡ إِلَىٰ هَٰرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayaḍīqu ṣadrī walā yanṭaliqu lisānī fa-arsil ilā hārūna
